oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Matching SIPO patents to Chinese listed firms ("Main Board").
Please refer to the user documentation "Chinese Patent Database User Documentation: Matching SIPO Patents to Chinese Publicly-Listed Companies and Subsidiaries" for more details about this dataset. Alternative data access: https://sites.google.com/site/sipopdb/home/SIPO_listed
